page.title: 06Housing - Winchfield Area.
page.content: {Privately owned houses}within the block tend to be farmhouses or large detached houses set in several acres. A number of old farm buildings, barns, an oast-house & 2 old schools have been converted into private dwellings. The{'big houses'}are Winchfield House, The Old Rectory, Court House & Shapley Hill House.{Winchfield Court}is the current name for the old hospital (formerly a 56 bed geriatric hospital & prior to that, the workhouse) which is being tastefully converted into a development of 33 luxury homes. The scattered hamlets have only a few houses on each side of the road.{Hart {Disrict Council owns a number of {houses}in Winchfield Hurst & Phoenix Green. The large area of housing between Reading Road North & Hitches Lane was built c.1970 to cope largely with Fleet's commuters.
